de.gnwi.mfsim.gui.chart

Interface ChartInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarChart, DataArrayChart, XyChart

    public interface ChartInterface
    Chart interface
    Author:
    Jan-Mathis Hein

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(int aWidth, int aHeight)
      Returns the chart as a buffered image with the given width and height
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(int aWidth, int aHeight, int anIndex)
      Returns the ith element of the chart (where i is anIndex) as a buffered image with the given width and height
      java.lang.String getStatisticsString()
      Returns the statistics of the chart or a message that there are no statistics available

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(int aWidth,
                                      int aHeight)
        Returns the chart as a buffered image with the given width and height
        Parameters:
        aWidth - Width of the image
        aHeight - Height of the image
        Returns:
        The chart as a buffered image with the given width and height

      • getImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(int aWidth,
                                      int aHeight,
                                      int anIndex)
        Returns the ith element of the chart (where i is anIndex) as a buffered image with the given width and height
        Parameters:
        aWidth - Width of the image
        aHeight - Height of the image
        anIndex - Index for chart element
        Returns:
        The ith element of the chart (where i is anIndex) as a buffered image with the given width and height

      • getStatisticsString

        java.lang.String getStatisticsString()
        Returns the statistics of the chart or a message that there are no statistics available
